mapper.select: select c.cid, mshort, semester, cnt FROM class_t c JOIN major_t m on m.mno = c.mno join teach_t t on t.cid = c.cid where school = #{school} and cno = #{cno}

select -- c.cno, cname, Date_format(day, '%Y-%m-%d'), (start, '%h:%i'), (end, '%h:%i') c.cno, cname, day, start, end, site, seat from exam_t e join examinee_t ee on e.eno = ee.eno join course_t c on c.cno = e.cno where sno = #{arg0}

select DISTINCT c.cno, cname, day, start, end, site, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = teacher1) as teacher1, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = teacher2) as teacher2 from exam_t e join inspector_t i on e.eno = i.eno join course_t c on c.cno = e.cno join teacher_t t on t.tno = i.teacher1 or t.tno = i.teacher2 where teacher1 = #{arg0} or teacher2 = #{arg1}

select e.eno, c.cno, cname, day,start,end,group_concat(DISTINCT site) as sites, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = patrol1) as patrol1, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = patrol2) as patrol2 from exam_t e join inspector_t ee on e.eno = ee.eno join course_t c on c.cno = e.cno join teacher_t t on t.tno = e.patrol1 or t.tno = e.patrol2 where patrol1 = #{arg0} or patrol2 = #{arg1}

select distinct e.eno, day, start, end, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = patrol1) as patrol1, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = patrol2) as patrol2 from exam_t e join inspector_t ee on e.eno = ee.eno join course_t c on c.cno = e.cno join teacher_t t on t.tno = e.patrol1 or t.tno = e.patrol2 where c.cno = #{arg0}

select distinct site, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = teacher1) as teacher1, (select tname from teacher_t where tno = teacher2) as teacher2 from exam_t e join inspector_t i on e.eno = i.eno join teacher_t t on t.tno = i.teacher1 or t.tno = i.teacher2 where e.eno = #{arg0}

select group_concat(mshort,semester,c.cnt) as cname, s.sno, sname, seat from exam_t e join examinee_t ee on e.eno = ee.eno join student_t s on s.sno = ee.sno join class_t c on s.cid = c.cid join major_t m on m.mno = c.mno where site = #{site} and e.eno = #{eno} group by c.cid
